Translations.Text: Ne$, day ur walan ara ar Oebbi i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, Izmer a d Ixleq i ten icban? Irra yasen lajel, ur degs ccekk. Ur b$in imednas, siwa tijehli
Ini: "lemmer tesaim igerrujen ueunu n Mass iw, ur ten tepnalem, a ppagwadem a ten tueoofem. Amdan izga d imceeei
Ni$ Nefka, i Musa, tza issekniyen iberrzen. Steqsi At Isoail. Mi d iusa $uosen, inna yas Feraun: "a Musa! Nek, wala$, war ccekk, seeeern ak
Inna: "ni$ teeoiv ur d issers yiwen wigi, d tiftilin, siwa Mass n tmurt akked igenwan. Nek, wala$, a Feraun, war ccekk, tieeenev
Ib$a a ten ieeaa si tmurt, N$emmeq it, akked wid iddan yides, meooa
Deffir es, Nenna i At Isoail: "zed$et tamurt. Mi d tusa lemaahda n laxeot, a kwen id Nawi, d iayfat
Nessers it id s tidep. S tidep, ay d irs. Nuzen ik id, kan, i ubecceo d uneddeo
Leqwoan Nfeoq it, iwakken a t temlev i medden, s laaqel. Nessader it id, s l$eov
Ini: "amnet yis, ne$ qqimet". Ih, ma mlan t i wid tebbwev tussna, uqbel is, ad $lin $ef udmawen, knan
Ad inin: "gedha s Mass nne$! Tuao lemaahda n Mass nne
Ad $lin $ef udmawen s imeiiawen. Ad innerni wannuz nnsen
Ini: "nujet $er Oebbi, ne$ nujet $er Uenin. Akken tnujem, ineS ismawen imaanen yifen akw wiyav". Di teallit ik, ur saalay uuut ik, ur t ssrusu. Ad isker kan
Ini: "ccekoan i Oebbi, ur Nesai aqcic, ur Nesai acrik di tgelda, ur Nesai bab mgal asdullu". Ssem$weo iT yal tem$weo
Ccekoan i Oebbi, id Issersen Tazmamt, i uxdim iS. Aawaj, degs, ur Irri
Tewqem, iwakken a ppaaggen $ef ssxev uwaio, s$uoeS; u a pbecceo lmumnin ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar nnsen warraz igerzen
Ad ilin degs, i lebda
A ppaaggen i wid innan: "Oebbi Isaa mmi S
Ur illi wayen ssnen fellas; akken, imezwura nnsen. D awal uqbie id iff$en seg imawen nnsen. D tikerkas kan ay ssawalen
Ahat a phelkev iman ik, ar loiha nnsen, a p$weblev, imi ur uminen ara s usali agi
Ni$ Nerra i illan di tmurt, d ccbaea ines, iwakken a Neeo menyif iten, ar igiten ilhan
A Nu$al a Nerr, i illan degs, d akal ibuoen
Ne$ t$ilev d At yifri kan, akked Oaqim, ay d lwehma, ger issekniyen nneÂ£
Mi ssoen iman nnsen ilmeeiyen deg ifri, nnan: "a Mass nne$! Efk ane$ d aeunu s$uoeK; Err a$ lameo nne$ d uuwib
Deg ifri, Nesle$ imeeeu$en nnsen, aceal iseggwasen
Sinna, Nessker iten id, a Neeo anta, ger snat n trebbuyaa, i ieesben aceal qqimen
Nekwni, ad ak Neeku, s tidep, taqsii nnsen. Nitni, ih, d ilmeeiyen, umnen s Mass nnsen. Nerna yasen nnhaya
Nesseohed ulawen nnsen, mi kren nnan: "Mass nne$ d Mass n tmurt akked igenwan. Ur nepnuju, d awez$i, ar oebbi, war Neppa, mulac a d nini awal dduni
Widak d agdud nne$. Aabden ioebbiten, war Neppa. Ay$eo ur a$ d bbwin, fellasen, adabu n uuee? Anwa i idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi
Mi ten tfuoqem, nitni akked wayen aabden war Oebbi, essoet iman nwen deg ifri. Ad awen Izraa, Mass nnwen, seg ueunu S. Ad awen Iheggi amwanes i lameo nnwen
